10 (0) REM MATRIX FUNCTION RND2$()
20 (1) OPTION BASE 0
30 (1) MAT A$ = RND2$(5%, 4%, 10%, "1")
40 (1) PRINT "MATRIX A"
50 (1) MAT PRINT A$
60 (1) OPTION BASE 1
70 (1) MAT B$ = RND2$(4%, 5%, 7%, "1")
80 (1) PRINT "MATRIX B"
90 (1) MAT PRINT B$
99 (1) END
